hadiths.text: Abu al-Ahwas quoted his father saying:I came to the Prophet (ﷺ) wearing a poor garment and he said (to me): Have you any property? He replied: Yes. He asked: What kind is it? He said: Allah has given me camels. Sheep, horses and slaves. He then said: When Allah gives you property, let the mark of Allah's favour and honour to you be seen

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي غَسْلِ الثَّوْبِ وَفِي الْخُلْقَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Worn Out Clothes, And Washing Clothes
